name: Inversion (itch) (Supercannon)
description:
A prototype first-person puzzler with challenging gravity defying mechanics. 

Controls:

Mouse/Keyboard:

  • WASD to move, mouse to look
  • Left click to place a gravity beacon (On white surfaces)
  • Q to switch gravity to the beacon
  • F to pickup/interact
  • Space to jump

Gamepad:

  • Left stick to move, right stick to look
  • Right trigger to place a gravity beacon (On white surfaces)
  • Right bumper to switch gravity to the beacon
  • X to pickup/interact
  • A to jump
